5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn ‘Umar that the Prophet (ﷺ) used to deliver two sermons, and he would sit briefly between the two. (One of the narrators) Bishr added:“While he was standing.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the sermon on Friday
